NewsItem.HEADLINE: RAN 2019 Expert Insight 2 (PDF)
NewsItem.SUMMARY: A special report on the value of CBRS spectrum and CBRS networks, in advance of bidding for PAL licenses.
NewsItem.NEWSLINETEXT: This report provides a view of the ROI for Private LTE / 5G customers in bidding for PAL licenses, comparing the value of spectrum and networks for private enterprise vs. mobile operators.
NewsItem.KEYWORDS: Private LTE CBRS PAL GAA Private 5G MNO
